org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor
Class EditorRepository

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor.EditorRepository

public class EditorRepository
extends java.lang.Object

EditorRepository provides methods for registering editors and accessing registered editors.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

public EditorRepository()
Method Detail

addEditor

public static void addEditor(java.lang.Class<? extends Editable> cls,
                             java.lang.Class<? extends Editor<? extends Editable>> editor)
Inserts an editor to this repository.

Parameters:
cls - the class of the editable object supported by the editor to be inserted
editor - the class of the editor to be inserted

getEditor

public static Editor<? extends Editable> getEditor(Editable obj)
                                            throws UnsupportedException
Returns a new editor that supports a specified editable object.

Parameters:
obj - an editable object
Returns:
a new editor that supports obj
Throws:
UnsupportedException - if there is no editor supporting obj

addPropertyEditor

public static void addPropertyEditor(java.lang.Class<?> cls,
                                     java.lang.Class<PropertyEditor> editor)
Inserts a property editor to this repository.

Parameters:
cls - the class of the object supported by the property editor to be inserted
editor - the class of the property editor to be inserted

getPropertyEditor

public static PropertyEditor getPropertyEditor(Editor<?> editor,
                                               java.lang.Object obj)
                                        throws UnsupportedException
Returns a new property editor that supports a specified object.

Parameters:
editor - the editor containing the object obj
obj - an object
Returns:
a new editor that supports obj
Throws:
UnsupportedException - if there is no property editor supporting obj
